main event: A sighting of four pulsating, tear-drop shaped objects occurred near Dallas, Texas on 12 September 1958.
interesting points: The objects changed colors between pink, red, and blue., The objects followed a straight path from NW to SE., The sighting lasted for approximately 10 minutes., The observer expressed skepticism about the genuineness of the observation., No definitive conclusion was reached regarding the nature of the objects.
witness description: The primary observer was a housewife with an estimate of reliability being possibly true.
